page.title: 16HEALTH IN MAGOR
page.content: In Magor we are very lucky because we have a doctor's surgery,dentist and a chemist.Magor Surgery is on Brassknocker street just off the main square,one of the doctors in the surgery is called Mr Louis. The surgery in Magor has toys for the little children to play with,and books for the mothers to read.Magor surgery is quite small and sometimes crowded with people from all around Magor. If the doctor has given you a prescription,there's Chemist where you collect your medicine or tablets is in the square.If your teeth need to be checked,above the chemist there's a dentist.The dentist has a big chair and a spot light to see into your mouth,he has an assistant who gets his tools ready for him.All in all the people in Magor are very healthy.
